history.content: If you're not in ORMS yet when you apply to CS, it makes sense to declare CS first and then you can fill out the double major paperwork when you hear from them. You can ask me or the person who lets you know about your CS major declaration any questions you have about the double major process.

if i'm double majoring in cs and orms (which is an application-based major) both at the end of this semester, should i still fill out the double major form on the cs application? i'm not 100% guaranteed to declare orms because i do have to fill out an application and i won't hear back until mid winter break or the start of next semester. i'm not sure if i should include this as a double major or declare cs first and then wait to see if i can declare orms. any advice would be appreciated!
history.subject: double major declaration form
